repnme.cdata!: India - Uttar Pradesh Agricultural Credit Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would support a three-year
            lending program of the LDB and qualified commercial banks.
            Investments to be financed would be the construction of
            about 10,000 masonry or dugwells equipped with Persian
            Wheels (a traditional lift device), 20,000 shallow tubewells
            and 20,000 medium depth tubewells energized by electric or
            diesel pumpsets. Shortages and unreliability of electricity
            supplies make it necessary to finance diesel as well as
            electric operated pumpsets.
